plugin_manifest.name: phloorSearchTypeRestriction
plugin_manifest.author: Alois Leitner
plugin_manifest.blurb: Search restriction for your Elgg site.
plugin_manifest.description: This plugin prevents certain object types from being displayed on the search result page. The administrator can individually set the allowed object types for guest as well as for logged in users. The search of an administrator is not restricted. The settings are all OPT-IN which means that by default NOTHING will be displayed to guests or ordinary users.
